data.text: The mountains are getting close now; the train and town are only visible in the far distance. What exactly are you hoping to find here, at the base of these impassable cliffs?

As you pause for a moment to gauge how much further it is, you think you hear something. A distant clicking, cold and faint, but terrifying nonetheless. The same clicking you heard when boarding the train initially. Those things are here, too? Or were you just imagining it?
The desert doesn't seem quite as safe as it had a moment ago, and it hadn't ever really felt particularly safe. You should be very careful if you continue on.
